item.title: 勒庞的阴影正笼罩着欧洲央行行长拉加德的继任之争
item.description: 在接替克里斯蒂娜·拉加德的竞争中，领导人何时选定下一任欧洲央行行长的问题，其重要性几乎与人选本身同样突出。【原文：In the race to succeed Christine Lagarde, the question of when leaders choose the next European Central Bank president is looming almost as large as who they pick.】

item.title: 皮克特在南非设立分支机构，因私人财富增长，BD称
item.description: 据《商业日报》报道，皮克特银行（Banque Pictet & Cie SA）在南非开设了办事处，这是这家瑞士私人银行在220年历史中首次进驻非洲市场。【原文：Banque Pictet & Cie SA opened an office in South Africa, the first time the Swiss private lender has had a presence in Africa in its 220-year history, Business Day reported.】

item.title: 曾主导沙特债务扩张的银行家将推动外商直接投资
item.description: 约十年前，沙特阿拉伯选中一位资深银行家协助建立债务市场计划，该计划使该王国跻身全球最活跃的债券发行国之列。他的下一个任务是帮助利雅得吸引海外资金，并使年度外国直接投资在2030年前增至1000亿美元，实现三倍增长。【原文：About a decade ago, Saudi Arabia picked a veteran banker to help set up a debt-market program that’s since transformed the kingdom into one of the most prolific bond issuers globally. His next task is to help Riyadh draw in overseas cash and triple annual foreign direct investment to $100 billion by 2030.】

item.title: 特朗普的新世界秩序正推动瑞典对欧元态度转暖
item.description:
地缘政治担忧促使人们对放弃克朗、采用欧洲共同货币产生了浓厚兴趣。【原文：

Geopolitical concerns have bolstered interest in dropping the krona for Europe’s common currency.

】

item.title: 瑞典为何改变接纳欧元的立场
item.description: 如同德国马克、法国法郎和芬兰马克一样，瑞典克朗终将沦为历史遗物——如果该国支持欧元的人士得偿所愿的话。【原文：Like the German mark, French franc and Finnish markka, Sweden’s krona may one day become a relic of the past — if the country’s proponents of the euro get their way.】

item.title: 分形股份在孟买上市首日股价下跌，此前在印度完成3.13亿美元IPO
item.description: 分形分析有限公司周一在孟买股市首次亮相即遭遇股价下跌，这表明在整体低迷的股市环境中，投资者对科技初创企业的热情持续低迷，估值问题仍是主要顾虑。【原文：Fractal Analytics Ltd. shares fell in their Mumbai trading debut on Monday, signaling continued weakness in investor appetite for technology startups amid valuation concerns in an otherwise subdued stock market.】

item.title: MiniMax Shares Surge 25% as Optimism Over Chinese AI Firms Grows
item.description: MiniMax Group Inc. shares surged in Hong Kong, buoyed by growing investor confidence in the technology offered by China’s generative AI startups.

item.title: Japan’s Ex FX-Chief Says Rate Hike Needed for Market Stability
item.description: Japan’s former currency chief said the Bank of Japan is “behind the curve” on taking policy action, adding that higher interest rates would help address inflation and stabilize markets.

item.title: Indian Stocks Face Fresh Pressure After Central Bank Action
item.description: India’s $5.2 trillion stock market has had a soft start to the year, and it could face further pressure as new regulatory measures to moderate trading activity add to existing concerns about corporate profit growth and foreign flows.

item.title: Singapore Home Sales See Slower Start to Year on Buyer Caution
item.description: Singapore’s new home sales got off to a slow start to the year after a couple of projects drew mixed responses from cautious buyers.

item.title: Telkom Indonesia Is Said to Revive Plan for Data Center Stake Sale
item.description: PT Telkom Indonesia is reviving a plan to sell a stake in its data center business to tap rising interest in digital infrastructure assets, according to people familiar with the matter.

item.title: Bears Tighten Grip on India IT as Global AI Angst Deepens
item.description: Any hit to IT sector profits could stall the broader earnings recovery.

item.title: S&P Pushes Ahead With Indonesia Stock Review as Rivals Hit Pause
item.description: S&P Dow Jones Indices said it’s monitoring developments over stock ownership transparency in Indonesia and will press ahead with its March quarterly rebalance, even as rival index providers have paused their reviews.

item.title: 工业金属在农历新年假期期间保持平稳
item.description: 本周工业金属市场开局平淡，因许多亚洲交易员因农历新年假期离线，美国市场也同步休市。【原文：Industrial metals had a subdued start to the week, with many Asian traders offline for the Lunar New Year break, and the US also closed.】

item.title: 泰国经济增速超预期 新政府获提振
item.description: 泰国第四季度经济增长远超预期，得益于消费、投资和政府支出的反弹。【原文：Thailand’s economy grew much more than expected in the fourth quarter, supported by a rebound in consumption, investment and government spending.】

item.title: 亚航首席执行官称旗下品牌公司即将通过纳斯达克后门上市
item.description: 亚航创始人托尼·费南德斯表示，这家亚洲航空公司的品牌部门正接近敲定纳斯达克上市目标，计划在今年晚些时候进行反向收购上市，新成立实体的估值将达到约15亿美元。【原文：AirAsia founder Tony Fernandes said that the Asian airline’s branding unit is closing in on a Nasdaq-listed target for a backdoor listing later this year that would value the newly created entity at about $1.5 billion.】

item.title: 阿里巴巴领跌科技股，五角大楼短暂公布黑名单
item.description: 阿里巴巴集团控股有限公司领跌中国科技股，此前五角大楼将该国多家知名企业列入协助军方的企业名单——但数分钟后便撤回该名单且未作解释。【原文：Alibaba Group Holding Ltd. led a Chinese tech-share selloff after the Pentagon added some of the country’s biggest names to a list of companies aiding the military — only to withdraw that roster minutes later without explanation.】

item.title: 印度通过科技领袖峰会谋求塑造人工智能未来的作用
item.description: 印度周一启动全球最大规模的人工智能峰会之一，总理纳伦德拉·莫迪正致力于为印度在激烈的尖端模型开发竞赛中开辟道路。【原文：India kicks off one of the world’s largest artificial intelligence summits Monday, with Prime Minister Narendra Modi seeking to clear a path for India in a heated race to develop frontier models.】

item.title: Laopu Gold, CMOC Shares Jump on Addition to Hang Seng Index
item.description: 中国珠宝商老普黄金公司和矿业公司中矿集团有限公司的股票在香港市场上涨，此前恒生指数公司在季度审查后将这两只股票纳入该市股票基准指数。【原文：Shares of Chinese jeweler Laopu Gold Co. and miner CMOC Group Ltd. rallied in Hong Kong, after Hang Seng Indexes Co. added the stocks to the city’s equity benchmark gauge following a quarterly review.】

item.title: 印度寻求重振高速公路的私人投资
item.description: 印度正努力吸引私人资本重返高速公路建设领域，此前因担忧收益风险和官僚拖延，投资者已撤离该领域十年之久。【原文：India is working to lure private capital back into highway construction, a decade after investors retreated over concerns about revenue risks and bureaucratic delays.】

item.title: 马来西亚经济意外强劲增长推动2026年预测上调
item.description: 马来西亚上季度远超预期的经济增长，促使众多分析师纷纷上调今年经济增长预期，部分预测认为这个东南亚国家将再次超越官方预测。【原文：Malaysia’s much better-than-expected growth last quarter has prompted a flurry of analyst upgrades to their forecasts for this year, with some predicting the Southeast Asian nation will once again outperform official projections.】

item.title: 黑石将领投6亿美元投资人工智能公司Neysa
item.description: 由黑石集团牵头的投资者团体计划对印度人工智能云初创企业Neysa进行最高6亿美元的股权投资。【原文：A group of investors led by Blackstone Inc. plans to make an equity investment of up to $600 million in India’s artificial intelligence cloud startup Neysa.】

item.title: 日本债券市场迎来转机：高市早苗胜选后，Jupiter’s Nash公司转投日本债券
item.description: 木星资产管理公司的马克·纳什首次对日本政府债券价格上涨作出长期战略性押注。【原文：For the first time ever, Jupiter Asset Management’s Mark Nash is placing a long-term, strategic bet that Japanese government bonds will rise.】

item.title: 涉及610亿美元债务的合并将助力印度信贷市场
item.description: 印度电力行业贷款机构近日宣布合并，这为全球增长最快的主要经济体注入了新的希望——能源及其他关键驱动领域有望获得更多融资支持。【原文：A recently announced merger of Indian lenders to the power sector is fueling hope that financing will get a boost for energy and other key drivers of the world’s fastest growing major economy.】

item.title: 日本经济增长乏力，高市早苗关注支出
item.description: 2025年第四季度日本经济产出远低于预期，在上一季度大幅萎缩后仅录得微弱增长，这进一步凸显了首相高市早苗在选举胜利后推行积极支出政策的必要性。【原文：Japan’s economic output in the fourth quarter of 2025 was much weaker than expected, registering anemic growth after a deep contraction in the previous period, underscoring the case for Prime Minister Sanae Takaichi’s proactive spending policies following her election triumph.】

item.title: 油价持稳，伊朗谈判前聚焦地缘政治风险
item.description: 本周初油价基本持平，交易员们密切关注地缘政治风险，因美伊谈判预计将于周二重启。【原文：Oil was little changed at the start of the week, as traders monitored geopolitical risk before talks between the US and Iran are expected to resume on Tuesday.】

item.title: 金价小幅回落，交易员锁定每盎司5000美元上方收益
item.description: 金价回落，因美国温和的通胀数据推动金价重回每盎司5000美元上方后，交易员纷纷获利了结。【原文：Gold slipped, as traders booked profits after mild US inflation data pushed the metal back above $5,000 an ounce.】

item.title: OpenAI聘请OpenClaw人工智能代理开发者彼得·斯坦伯格
item.description: 彼得·斯坦伯格，知名开源人工智能程序OpenClaw的创建者，即将加入OpenAI公司，助力这家ChatGPT开发者的产品阵容。【原文：Peter Steinberger, creator of popular open-source artificial intelligence program OpenClaw, will be joining OpenAI Inc. to help bolster the ChatGPT developer’s product offerings.】

item.title: 麦格理牵头的财团同意以83亿美元收购Qube控股公司
item.description: 由麦格理资产管理公司牵头的财团将以约117亿澳元（83亿美元）收购Qube控股有限公司。此次收购将使这家澳大利亚企业旗下庞大的基础设施资产版图新增港口与铁路运营商业务。【原文：A group led by Macquarie Asset Management will buy Qube Holdings Ltd. in a deal worth around A$11.7 billion ($8.3 billion), as the Australian firm adds a ports and rail operator to its vast swath of infrastructure assets.】

item.title: 日本家族奋力争夺157年老字号企业控制权
item.description: 石川县是毗邻日本海的偏远山区县，但一家自1869年便扎根当地的连锁药店命运，却牵动着数百公里外的东京金融市场。【原文：Ishikawa is a remote, mountainous prefecture bordering the Sea of Japan, but the fate of a drug store chain whose local roots go back to 1869 has implications for Tokyo’s financial markets hundreds of kilometers away.】
